captions.text: [ slurping ]
[ burps ]

Good luck, spud.
Cheers, cowboy.

Now, remember, if they think
you're not trying,
You're in trouble, right?

<i>First hint of that</i>
<i>and they'll be on to the dhss,</i>

"this cunt
is not trying,"

And your giro is
fucking finished, right?

You might get
the fucking job.

Exactly.
<i>Nightmare.</i>

It's a tightrope, spud.
It's a fucking tightrope.

See, I just get pure shy
with the interviewer cats.

Like, I get all nervous. I can't
answer any of the questions.
<i>Like, I'm a footballer,</i>

And I get nerves
on the big occasion, man.
Try some of this, spud.

<i>Yeah, a little dab of speed</i>
<i>is just the ticket, man.</i>

<i>No, I went to craigy,</i>
<i>craignewton.</i>

I just put down royal edinburgh
college to help get the job.

There's too much discrimination
in this town, man.

'cause they're both schools,
right?

And we're all in this
together.

And I wanted to put
across the general idea
rather than the details.

People get all hung up
on details.

Like which school did I go to?
How many grades did I get?

It could be, like, six, could be
none. It's not important.

What is important
is that I am, yes?

<i>Mr. Murphy, do you mean that</i>
<i>you lied on your application?</i>
<i>No!</i>

<i>Yes, only to get my foot</i>
<i>in the door.</i>

Showing initiative
and that, like.

<i>But you were referred here by</i>
<i>the department of employment.</i>
Cool.

Whatever you say, man.
Sorry.

You're the man,
the dude in the chair.

I am merely here.
But obviously I'm here.

<i>Mr. Murphy,</i>
<i>what exactly attracts you</i>
To the leisure industry?
In a word, pleasure.

Like, my pleasure
in other people's leisure.

Do you see yourself
as having any weaknesses?

Oh, yes, 'cause, like, I'm a bit
of a perfectionist, actually.

Like, if things get a bit dodgy,
I just cannot be bothered.

<i>Seems to me like it's going</i>
<i>pretty well, eh?</i>
Thank you, mr. Murphy.
<i>We'll let you know.</i>

The pleasure was mine,
man.

<i>Renton: Spud had done well.</i>
<i>I was proud of him.</i>

title: Trainspotting (5/12) Movie CLIP - Spud's Job Interview (1996) HD
